name: Nike Superfly 6 Pro FG
description: The micro-textured, premium synthetic and fabric upper of the Nike Superfly 6 Pro FG wraps underneath your foot for a second-skin-like fit. A 2-part podular plate system utilizes chevron studs for speed in every step, while embossed speed ribs from heel to toe make your boot look as fast as you feel.Shown: Hyper CrimsonWhiteMetallic SilverBlackStyle: AH7368-801
